scenario.sendMessageHTTP: GET http://[Remote-Address]/ HTTP/1.1 Accept: image/gif, image/jpeg, image/pjpeg, image/pjpeg, application/x-shockwave-flash, application/vnd.ms-excel, application/vnd.ms-powerpoint, application/msword, application/xaml+xml, application/x-ms-xbap, application/x-ms-application, */* Referer: http://www.imsloader.com/ Accept-Language: fr User-Agent: XMLLoader 5.2 Proxy-Connection: Keep-Alive Host: [Remote-Address]
